alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 10:32AM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow occurring with patches of freezing rain this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in northern Erie County. * WHERE...Northern Erie, Southern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the area this morning before transitioning to a wintry mix of snow and sleet and then rain by early this afternoon. The heaviest snow is expected this morning when snow rates of up to 1 inch per hour may be possible. Additional snow accumulation with lake effect is likely tonight through Thursday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
